verbs.description: So glad that Trump [V: is] doing something good -- promoting peace -- and some Democrats have high enough character to point it out !
So glad that [ARG0: Trump] is [V: doing] [ARG1: something good] -- promoting peace -- and some Democrats have high enough character to point it out !
So glad that [ARG0: Trump] is doing something good -- [V: promoting] [ARG1: peace] -- and some Democrats have high enough character to point it out !
So glad that Trump is doing something good -- promoting peace -- and [ARG0: some Democrats] [V: have] [ARG1: high enough character to point it out] !
So glad that Trump is doing something good -- promoting peace -- and some Democrats have high enough character to [V: point] [ARG1: it] out !
